short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Annoying Tab Buster wipes the tabs the specified domain and provides some useful tab management features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your tab list clean by wiping unnecessary tabs.

This extension provides below feature:

・Wipe
Wipe out tabs matched in Wipe List.

・Isolate
Isolate matched tabs to new window.

・Sort
Sort tabs on current window.
